message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $120, so I'm offering it to you for $105.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and meet at $97.50?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit, so I can only go up to $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but that's as low as I can go.
